name: The Cornfield Road
storyline: You play as Emily, a lone traveler driving through a desolate countryside at night. Your car suddenly sputters and dies on an isolated road. With no cellphone and miles away from the nearest town, you are forced to venture out on foot in search for help.
summary: This is a short horror experience where you find yourself stuck in a mysterious road, tring to get back home. But are you really safe walking all by yourself?
